newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY GRAIN, LIVEHOG END 1996 TRADING ON DEC 19.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY GRAIN, LIVEHOG END 1996 TRADING ON DEC 19.

text.p: The last trading day of the year in the grain section of the Budapest Commodity Exchange (BCE) will be December 19, the BCE said on Tuesday.
The grain section will reopen on January 2, and will begin trading on every working day, compared with the present Tuesday to Thursday trade, the BCE said.
The livehog section's last day will also be December 19, and it will continue two day-a-week trading on Tuesdays and Thursdays from January 2, the BCE said.
The currency futures section will be open next week on December 23 and 27, and also on December 30 and 31.
